nodes.text: The Xot were a sentient species characterized by their small size and head shaped like a pair of macrobinoculars. Known Xot included Bidvel and Davil, who operated a scrap pile.

The Xot were small-sized, with heads shaped like a pair of macrobinoculars. They had large feet, four-fingered hands that included an opposable thumb, two feelers above the nostrils, and two other feelers dangling from under their large eyes. Their skin varied in hue, from gray-blue to pink.
or even red. Similarly, their irises came in a variety of colors, including green, pink, and red.

In the third year before the Battle of Yavin, the Xot Bidvel and Davil were running a scrap pile on a remote planetoid. In the second year before the Battle of Yavin, on the day that Hera Syndulla, Garazeb Orrelios, and Rex rescued Ketsu Onyo from the Starlag XIX space-bound prison, there was at least one Xot inmate there.
